#data simulation
```{r}
set.seed(1)
sigma = 1
b0 = 1
b1 = 1
alpha = 5
M = 1000

error = 0
for(i in 1:M){
  x = rnorm(M,1,sigma) 
  mu = exp(b0 + b1*x)
  y = rnbinom(M,size = alpha, mu = mu)

  model1 = glm(y ~ x, family = "poisson")

  coef = coef(model1)["x"]
  se = sqrt(vcov(model1)["x", "x"])
  z = (1 - coef) / se
  p_value = 2 * (1 - pnorm(abs(z)))
  error[i] = ifelse(p_value < 0.05, 0, 1)
}
mean(error)
```
